title: Techniques for Hypnotic Regression and Healing Exercises
first_phrase: In the preceding text, the author explores a technique to induce a hypnotic state called fascination. In the last 200 tokens, the author describes how to use fascination to help a subject let go of negative emotions and access past memories using regression. The exercise involves guiding the subject to focus on a particular emotion, inducing fascination, and asking questions about the past experience related to the emotion. The author also outlines a technique to connect with a subject's energy and give suggestions.
